name: INVADED (Alpha)
description:
I'm sure you ever thinked about a game (or even a movie) where robots dominate the world! Welcome to INVADED! You will spawn in a base full of robots, and you will need to kill them. After that, every subject from the robots will be free, and will make the peace take over again.

Made with Unity's FPS Microgame.

Note : In the In-Game Menu, you may see a checkmark without any text. This is an error, its the toggle mute music button. I'll fix that later.
